 You may either <color=#ffb400ff>move a piece on the board</color> or <color=#ffb400ff>deploy a new piece</color>.
 You have also gained an <color=#ffb400ff>additional movement roll</color>! (You can only gain a maximum of 2 additional movement rolls in each turn.)
